parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Multiplayer </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Variables </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the value of variable in the variable space assigned to various data types.
All available data types combinations:
{<template><title>!</title></template> class<template><title>=</title></template>"bikitable"
! Primary syntax ([[String]])
! Alternative syntax ([[Array]])
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>
* [[Namespace]] getVariable [[String]]
* [[Object]] getVariable [[String]]
* [[Group]] getVariable [[String]]
* [[Team_Member]] getVariable [[String]]
* [[Task]] getVariable [[String]]
* [[Location]] getVariable [[String]]
* [[Control]] getVariable [[String]] (since <template><title>arma3</title></template> v1.55.133553)
* [[Display]] getVariable [[String]] (since <template><title>arma3</title></template> v1.55.133553)
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>
* [[Namespace]] getVariable [[Array]] (since <template><title>arma2</title></template> OA v1.60)
* [[Object]] getVariable [[Array]]
* [[Group]] getVariable [[Array]]
* [[Team_Member]] getVariable [[Array]]
* [[Task]] getVariable [[Array]] (since <template><title>arma3</title></template> v1.67)
* [[Location]] getVariable [[Array]] (since <template><title>arma3</title></template> v1.67)
* [[Control]] getVariable [[Array]] (since <template><title>arma3</title></template> v1.55.133553))
* [[Display]] getVariable [[Array]] (since <template><title>arma3</title></template> v1.55.133553)
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>}

<template lineStart="1"><title>Important </title><part><name index="1"/><value> When variable is [[setVariable|set]] on a [[Task]], it is not actually set on the task itself, but on the FSM attached to the task.<br>
If there is no FSM, [[getVariable]] will not work.</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature arma3 </title><part><name index="1"/><value> In the case of Alt Syntax usage in <template><title>arma3</title></template>, ''defaultValue'' will be returned if:
* Requested variable is either undefined or [[nil]]
* Variable namespace is null ([[objNull]], [[grpNull]], etc.)</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> varspace [[getVariable]] name </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> varspace: [[Namespace]], [[Object]], [[Display]], [[Control]], [[Group]], [[Location]], [[Task]], [[Team Member]], [[Display]], [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> name: [[String]] - variable name that was defined in [[setVariable]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Anything]] or [[Nothing]] if the variable doesn't exist </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> varspace [[getVariable]] [name, defaultValue] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> varspace: [[Namespace]], [[Object]], [[Display]], [[Control]], [[Group]], [[Location]], [[Task]], [[Team Member]], [[Display]], [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> name: [[String]] - Variable name that was defined in [[setVariable]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> defaultValue: [[Anything]] - Value to return if variable doesn't exist </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Anything]] - current value of the variable or ''defaultValue'' if the variable doesn't exist. </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _variable = myTruck [[getVariable]] "myVariable"; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns [[nil]] if "myVariable" is not set</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _variable = myTruck [[getVariable]] ["myVariable", 50]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns 50 if "myVariable" is not set</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Set damage of car0..car5 to 0:
<code>[[for]] "_i" [[from]] 0 [[to]] 5 [[do]] {
	_car = [[missionNamespace]] [[getVariable]] ("car" [[valuea_plus_valueb|+]] [[str]] _i);
	_car [[setDamage]] 0;
};</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> <code>myMissionVar = 2015;
[[missionNamespace]] [[getVariable]] "myMissionVar"; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns 2015</value></part></template></code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x5</name>=<value> WARNING when using dynamic default values as they always get evaluated:
<code>[[missionNamespace]] [[getVariable]] ["var", 123 [[call]] fnc_abc];
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>fnc_abc is called every [[getVariable]] even if "var" is defined</value></part></template></code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE5</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x6</name>=<value> Get current value of a variable and if it is undefined, define it and get the defined value:<code>[[private]] _var = [[missionNamespace]] [[getVariable]] "varName";
[[if]] ([[isNil]] "_var") [[then]]
{
	[[missionNamespace]] [[setVariable]] ["varName", 123]; 
	_var = 123;
};
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>_var here will contain current value of the variable varName</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE6</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setVariable]], [[allVariables]], [[getFSMVariable]]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 13, 2016 - 17:13 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Ebay|Ebay]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
'''NOTE: <template><title>arma2</title></template> ONLY! In <template><title>arma3</title></template> this will return default value:'''
Warning: the alternative syntax returns undefined when the varspace is an object and that object is null. Example:<br>
<code>_test = [[objNull]] [[getVariable]] ["test", "0"];
[[systemChat]] _test;</code>
Errors because _test is undefined. Tested in A2OA 1.63.131129
</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 31, 2017 - 03:29 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:AgentRevolution|AgentRev]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
You can do typechecking using [[param]]:
<code>[[private]] _myVar = [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[player]] [[getVariable]] "myVar"] [[param]] [0, "", [""]];</code>
and [[params]]:
<code><ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[[player]] [[getVariable]] "myVar"] [[params]] [["_myVar", "", [""]]];</code>
</dd>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
